features: Self-Contained Printer Kit: 🖨️The mini sticker printer in the kit requires no ink, toner, or ribbon. Use thermal paper instead of ink, save money, the mini thermal printer kit comes with 1 rolls of paper (Installed inside the the mini picture printer), Printed black and white photos can be graffiti and share parent-child graffiti time with your children.

Great Configuration: 🖨️The free "Tiny Print" app is made just for the user. Bluetooth photo printer adopts high quality inkless thermal print head, connect Android or iOS operating system via bluetooth, high quality print head resolution up to 200dpi, mini printed sticker maker is qualified sticker printer and flexible label manufacturing Merchant ~ Ready to print all kinds of labels and stickers you need. Built-in 1000mAH lithium battery, fully charged mini portable printer can work for 15 hou

WIDE RANGE OF USE: 🖨️This mini inkless printer is suitable for printing black and white photos, documents, recordings, memos, web pages, labels, barcode stickers, post-it notes, and can also be fixed for horizontal or vertical printing. Our mini pocket printer is great gift for birthday, Christmas, graduation, trave, school gifts, and Children's Day. Suitable for children, family members, students, friends, teachers, businessmen, travelers and others who need this practical mini photo printer.

Inkless Note Printer Mini: 🖨️The inkless pocket printer measures 3.2x3.2x1.8 inches. This pocket printer is small and portable, you can put it in your pocket or bag, the portable printer for phone can immediately print out the documents needed for mobile phone recordings, photos and photos, record your life, work and study anytime and anywhere. This is the ideal accessory for students, travelers and anyone who needs a portable mini printer with them.

Easy to Use: 🖨️download the "Tiny Print" APP through the mobile phone according to the instruction manual; open the note printer box with printing paper, put in the type of printing paper you need to use, turn on the mini bluetooth printer, and connect the APP on the mobile phone through bluetooth, that is printable. If you receive a defective sticker printer machine or have any questions about our portable photo printer, please feel free to contact us, we will try to give the best solution.
body.description: 🖨️🖨️FasionMior Multifunctional Portable Mini Printer Use Steps:1: Download the free"Tiny Print" APP 2: Correctly install the printing paper 3:Press the printer sticker machine power button for 3 seconds to turn on 4: Turn on the mobile phone Bluetooth link wireless inkless mini printer 5: Open the APP to enjoy the fun of printing 6: Press the mini printer power button to change the different light Portable Inkless Printer SpecificationsColor: PinkMaterial: ABS + PCConnection: BT/USBPower Supply: Rechargeable Lithium BatteryBattery: 1000mAhPaper Width: 57mmRoll Diameter: 30mmItem Size: 3.7x3.34x1.96 InchUser Manual: EnglishMini Thermal Printer Print:Only print black and white Compatible with iOS and AndroidLink APP and machine via bluetoothClearer resolution than other products makes it easier to make the recipient happy！🎁🎁Printer Package Includes1 x mini sticker printer1 x USB cable1 x manual guide.1 x roll paper

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sticker printer
reviews.reviewText: The post says sticker printer but the paper is not close to a sticker . Looks like someone used it and returned to . Disappointed but it is nice wish is was actually sticker printer .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Espectacular, funciona de maravilla, puedo tomar fotos e imprimirlas al instante ademas de poder imprimir imagenes ya guasdadas, super liviano no ocupa tanto espacio , me encanta !

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good small printer for that price
reviews.reviewText: The images are not awesome but it's good enough for simple prints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great, I love the compact and very easy to read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not come with sticker paper!
reviews.reviewText: Received this item today and upon opening it, it had a weird scent (smelled like skunk). It is advertised as a sticker printer but does not come with sticker paper. It came with plain paper that is similar to a receipt roll. I’ll probably keep the item bc I don’t want to mess with returning, but if you decide to buy it make sure you purchase sticker paper and let it air out before gifting.
